import flet as ft

class MyButton(ft.ElevatedButton):
    def __init__(self, t):
        super().__init__()
        self.text = t
        self.bgcolor = ft.Colors.LIGHT_GREEN_100
        self.color = ft.Colors.GREEN_800

import flet as ft

class MyButton(ft.ElevatedButton):
    def __init__(self, t):
        super().__init__()
        self.text = t
        self.bgcolor = ft.Colors.LIGHT_GREEN_100
        self.color = ft.Colors.GREEN_800

def main(page: ft.Page):
    bt = MyButton(t="ãƒœã‚¿ãƒ³1")
    page.add(bt)

ft.app(main)

class MyButton(ft.ElevatedButton):
    def __init__(self, t):
        super().__init__()
        self.text = t
        self.bgcolor = ft.Colors.LIGHT_GREEN_100
        self.color = ft.Colors.GREEN_800
        self.icon = ft.Icons.SMART_BUTTON_ROUNDED
        self.style = ft.ButtonStyle(padding=20)

class ProfileCard(ft.Card):
    def __init__(self, image, name, role=None, tech_stack=[]):
        super().__init__()
        # æœ€åˆã®3ã¤ã ã‘ã‚’ä½¿ç”¨
        tech_stack = tech_stack[:3]
        self.content = ft.Container(
            content=ft.Row(
                controls=[
                    ft.Image(
                        src=image,
                        width=120,
                        height=180,
                        fit=ft.ImageFit.COVER,
                        border_radius=10,
                    ),
                    ft.Column(
                        controls=[
                            ft.Text(value=role, size=12, color=ft.Colors.GREY),
                            ft.Text(value=name, size=25, weight=ft.FontWeight.BOLD),
                            ft.Column(
                                controls=[
                                    ft.Text(value=f"ãƒ»{i}", size=15) for i in tech_stack
                                ]
                            ),
                        ],
                    ),
                ],
                spacing=30,
            ),
            padding=15,
            width=350,
        )
        self.color = ft.Colors.GREEN_50
        self.elevation = 10
